Author: mrlynch#5735
Content:
in stats script change `"$(./checkwalletsize.sh | awk '{print $5}' | head -1)"` to
```"$(./checkwalletsize.sh | grep -i ".komodo/wallet.dat" | awk '{print $5}')"```
